page.title: 11Stapleford Mill.
page.content:
Mrs Wright, the owner of Stapleford Mill, has lived in the same house for 18 years. The house was built in 1854. When she goes shopping she goes to Leighton Buzzard. She helps around the house.Her husband is a lawyer. They have a long board of their family tree on display in the old mill. They have a 11 acres of land with the old mill. They have two children aged 36 and 34. One is a doctor and the other is a J.P.
The house was used as a hunting lodge. A record of the mill can be found in the Domesday Book.
